2 tablespoons sugar, preferably superfine “bar sugar,” plus more for the rims
Strips of lime zest, for garnish

https://www.eatingwell.com/recipe/252284/

Strips of lime zest, for garnish

------------------------------------------
<T>Pomegranate Cosmos 2¼ cups pomegranate juice
2¼ cups vodka
1 cup lime juice
¾ cup Cointreau, or Grand Marnier
¼ cup ginger juice, (see Note)
2 tablespoons sugar, preferably superfine “bar sugar,” plus more for the rims
Strips of lime zest, for garnish

<T>Pomegranate Cosmos 2¼ cups pomegranate juice
2¼ cups vodka
1 cup lime juice
¾ cup Cointreau, or Grand Marnier
¼ cup ginger juice, (see Note)
2 tablespoons sugar, preferably superfine “bar sugar,” plus more for the rims
Strips of lime zest, for garnish

1 cup lime juice
¾ cup Cointreau, or Grand Marnier
¼ cup ginger juice, (see Note)
2 tablespoons sugar, preferably superfine “bar sugar,” plus more for the rims
Strips of lime zest, for garnish

https://www.eatingwell.com/recipe/252655/

¼ cup ginger juice, (see Note)
2 tablespoons sugar, preferably superfine “bar sugar,” plus more for the rims
Strips of lime zest, for garnish

Strips of lime zest, for garnish
